intro: Minimal input, maximum tension — return to the blue planet.
description:
The astronaut awakens aboard a space station—then a fragmented SOS from Earth cuts through the silence.
With the ultra-high-performance planetary defense AI GAIA (Global Autonomous Intelligence Assistant), undertake a mission to return to Earth.
Your only tools are the skills honed in training: “Jump” and “Move.”
Countless space debris, electromagnetic rings, and rampaging drones—one misstep in zero-gravity is instant failure.
Push through the pressure and uncover what happened to Earth.
